column4:
['Ghunghat mein chehara chhupaati bhi hai', '
Ghunghat se chehara dikhaati bhi hai', '
Yeh naachati hai nachaati bhi hai', '
Yeh bhaagati hai bhagaati bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Haay haay bhaav khaati bhi hai, re baaba', '
Ghunghat mein chehara chhupaati bhi hai', '
Ghunghat se chehara dikhaati bhi hai', '
Yeh naachati hai nachaati bhi hai', '
Yeh bhaagati hai bhagaati bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Haay haay bhaav khaati bhi hai, re baaba', '
Ghunghat mein chehara chhupaati bhi hai', '
Ghunghat se chehara dikhaati bhi hai', 'Are baapu hai tumako woh padi', '
Hai saamane meri mushkil badi', '
Meri dubaara na shaadi karo,', '
Yun na meri barbaadi karo', '
Roti bhi hai rulaati bhi hai,', '
Aurat musibat ko laati bhi hai', '
Bachchon se ghar sajaati bhi hai,', '
Ga ga ke lori sunaati bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Haay haay haay bhaav khaati bhi hai', '
Ghunghat mein chehara chhupaati bhi hai', '
Ghunghat se chehara dikhaati bhi hai', 'Pota nahi hota main kya karu,', '
Shaadi se achchha hai main ja maru', '
Pehali gharwaali ne paagal kiya,', '
Dusari ki aane se main toh daru', '
Are murga banaake khilaati bhi hai,', '
Mardon ko murga banaati bhi hai', '
Sapano ko sach kar dikhaati bhi hai,', '
Pidhi ko aage badhaati bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Yeh plus bhi hai yeh minus bhi hai', '
Haay haay bhaav khaati bhi hai, re baaba', '
Ghunghat mein chehara chhupaati bhi hai', '
Ghunghat se chehara dikhaati bhi hai', '
Yeh naachati hai nachaati bhi hai', '
Yeh bhaagati hai bhagaati bhi hai.']
